Mod-able and enjoyable dynamic with bots. While the game is far from being realistic, it does present ragdoll physics that give some depth of realism when it comes to people and dead bodies. I think there are some glitches when it comes to some coding and player/weapon models, but the game still goes fine.

Dang, don't know what to say about his game, much better then counter strike for sure. But also too it gives a tiny 1990 arcade vibe to it and as well people don't hack. But my prod with the game is the time the timers people put is 4000 hours which is days and days

What should happen to the game ( 2022 )
1.It would be more fun if it got a 2022 update with new guns and new characters to play around with 9 also do some col stuff )

2. Remove making your own timers for the game, they are really crazy 

3. Add gun skins in the game, it would make it more fun for a lot of CS:GO players to play this ( even knive skins )

4. Make things for the characters ( such as hats and clothing ) it would make the even better.


My last thing, the games worth getting
